mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.goodsid AS "goods.id", cg.name AS "goods.name", cg.big AS "goods.big.id", cuna.name AS "goods.big.name", cg.zong AS "goods.zong.id", cunb.name AS "goods.zong.name", cg.small AS "goods.small.id", cunc.name AS "goods.small.name", cg.specid AS "goods.spec.id", csp.name AS "goods.spec.name", sao.name AS "goods.gclass.name", sat.name AS "goods.gclass.parent.name",
sai.name AS "goods.bands.name", a.nub AS "nub", a.jg AS "jg", a.rknub AS "rknub", a.rk_date AS "rkDate", crk.id AS "rkinfo.id", csu.id AS "rkinfo.supplier.id", csu.name AS "rkinfo.supplier.name", a.state AS "state", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN c_goods cg ON a.goodsid=cg.id LEFT JOIN c_rkinfo crk ON a.id=crk.cgzbid LEFT JOIN c_supplier csu ON crk.supplierid=csu.id LEFT JOIN c_unit cuna ON cg.`big`=cuna.`id` LEFT JOIN c_unit cunb ON cg.`zong`=cunb.`id` LEFT JOIN c_unit cunc ON cg.`small`=cunc.`id` LEFT JOIN c_spec csp ON cg.`specid`=csp.`id` LEFT JOIN c_gclass sao ON sao.id=cg.gclassid LEFT JOIN c_gclass sat ON sat.id=sao.parent_id LEFT JOIN c_bands sai ON sai.id=cg.bandsid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_cgzbinfo( id, goodsid, nub, jg, rknub, rk_date, state, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{goods.id}, #{nub}, #{jg}, #{rknub}, #{rkDate}, #{state}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_cgzbinfo SET goodsid = #{goods.id}, nub = #{nub}, jg = #{jg}, rknub = #{rknub}, rk_date = #{rkDate}, state = #{state}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
